list.text: Change the keyboard actions of the game
list.help: KEY CONFIGURE - Set up the keyboard settings

list.text: See the ending credits of the game
list.help: CREDITS - See the creators of Custom Wars Tactics

list.text: Leave, we see how it is. :)

list.help: UP - Sets a keyboard key for up
DOWN - Sets a keyboard key for down
LEFT - Sets a keyboard key for left
RIGHT - Sets a keyboard key for right
SELECT - Sets a keyboard key for select
CANCEL - Sets a keyboard key for cancel
- Press SELECT to edit this item -
GO BACK - Go back to title screen
PRESS A KEY - Sets key pressed to highlighted item
